welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hartselle, USA! Get ready to experience the charm of our small town and its friendly locals. Don't miss out on exploring our historic downtown and trying our famous southern cuisine. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pyor Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pyor Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Huntsville International - Carl T. Jones Field

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Huntsville International - Carl T. Jones Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Huntsville International - Carl T. Jones Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'HSV Free Wi-Fi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
